sourcesContent:
import React, { Component } from 'react' import './index.sass' import logic from '../../logic'; class Register_Pet extends Component { state = { name: '', specie: '', breed: '', color: '', gender: '', birthdate: '', microchip: '', petlicence: '', neutered: '', vaccionations: '', controls: '', details: '', error: null } handleOnChange = ({ target: { name, value } }) => this.setState({ [name]: value }) handleRegisterSubmit = event => { event.preventDefault() const { state: { name, specie, breed, color, gender, birthdate, microchip, petlicence, neutered, vaccionations, controls, details} } = this this.register({ name, specie, breed, color, gender, birthdate, microchip, petlicence, neutered, vaccionations, controls, details }) } handleGoHome = event => { event.preventDefault() this.props.history.push('/home') } register = async (name, specie, breed, color, gender, birthdate, microchip, petlicence, neutered, vaccionations, controls, details) => { try { console.log('logged', logic.__userId__) debugger await logic.registerPet(name, specie, breed, color, gender, birthdate, microchip, petlicence, neutered, vaccionations, controls, details) console.log('logged', logic.__userId__) } catch ({ message }) { this.setState({ error: message }) } } render() { return

Pet's details':

{/*
*/} 9

Vaccionations and booster shots:

Veterinary controls:

Details of clinical interests:

{this.state.error &&

{this.state.error}

} {this.state.isRegister &&

You have successfully registered!

}
} } export default Register_Pet
